page.title: 06ABERAERON COMPREHENSIVE
page.content: {YSGOL GYFUN ABERAERON {_____________________ {May 12th 1896} Aberaeron Intermediate School opened in the Town Hall with 40 pupils and 3 teachers, Mr G Gwyn Jones (Headmaster),Mr Senior, and Miss Hook. {September 1898 }School moved to present site overlooking the Town. The School was built from funds collected locally. {1907} The official school magazine {"THE LINK"}was first published. {1908 }The first school Eisteddfod. {1917 }Mr H.T. Evans appointed as Head. {1920 }The{School Institute or Club founded. {1923} School closed for 8 weeks because of a teachers strike. {1946 }272 pupils,12 full time teachers {1970 }School becomes a Comprehensive. {1973 Mr D.J. Thomas O.B.E.}the present Headmaster is appointed.
